title: Cranberry oat and white chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['225g apple sauce', '115g butter, softened', '220g dark brown sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon salt (optional)', '250g oats', '120g dried cranberries', '140g white chocolate chips']
